snippet: About 600 homes near the mountain resort community of Sun Valley were ordered evacuated on Friday as a wind-driven wildfire torched its way through sage and pine trees.
abstract: About 1,600 homes near mountain resort community of Sun Valley in Idaho are ordered evacuated as a wind-driven wildfire torches its way through sage and pine trees.
lead_paragraph: About 600 homes near the mountain resort community of Sun Valley were ordered evacuated on Friday as a wind-driven wildfire torched its way through sage and pine trees.
